title: Fri Post Show (07-01-22)
itunes:title: Fri Post Show (07-01-22)
description:
Bobby has an issue with his iPhone that’s frustrating him right now and the building we are working in right now. A listener leaves a voicemail about Abby going on vacation by herself for 5 days. We also get an update about her performing with the band. We get into some assorted news stories. We talk about actors retiring. Bobby talks about going to see Ben Rector and how he got backstage without a pass.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby has an issue with his iPhone that’s frustrating him right now and the building we are working in right now. A listener leaves a voicemail about Abby going on vacation by herself for 5 days. We also get an update about her performing with the band. We get into some assorted news stories. We talk about actors retiring. Bobby talks about going to see Ben Rector and how he got backstage without a pass.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
